item.title: Buying item command help rep ++ for help!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:3, topic:334679”]Here you go, interesting concept Btw.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("buyclaws")){ if(HasItemAmount(1514, 9000)) { deleteItem(1514, 9000); addItem(8002, 1); setAnimation(894); sM("You trade 9,000 Magic Logs for Dragon Claws!"); } else { sM("You need 9,000 Magic Logs for Dragon Claws..."); } }

@Fantom

setAnimation(int id) Is used to preform an emotion.[/quote] thank you times a million deathschaos9, and congrats on the 200 rep :D, and thx fantom for the comment :P[quote=“fantom, post:2, topic:334679”]Wow ur actually decent at coding, when i saw u host ur server i just thought that u were a noob that just copied someones source completely and didnt bother editing but ic im wrong but anyways what is the setAnimation(894); for? i know what everything else does but not so sure about that[/quote] And its like this special gfx with fireworks, I just though it would be cool :P.
I wish I could rep you death, you deserve to go higher then 200 rep for helping so many people.

Read full topic

item.title: Buying item command help rep ++ for help!
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

fantom:

i figured but what emote would u possibly use when u buy something? and when u write if(command.equalsignorecase(“buy claws”)) wouldnt that mean that if u do ::buyclaws it ignores it or what does that mean?

equalsIgnoreCase means that it will do the command if you type it BuYClAwS or not. Its ignores case sensitivity.

Read full topic

item.title: Buying item command help rep ++ for help!
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("tradeclaws"))
{
     tradeIn(1514, 9000, 8002, 1);
}

void tradeIn(int i, int iAmount, int j, int jAmount)
{
	if(playerHasItem(i, iAmount)
	{
		deleteItem(i, iAmount);
		addItem(j, jAmount);
		sM("You trade " + iAmount.toString() + " " + getItemName(i) + " for " +getItemName(j);
	} else {
		sM("Insufficient " + getItemName(i) + " you need " + iAmount.toString() +".");
	}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Buying item command help rep ++ for help!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Hi there im X andrew X the owner and coder of the new rsps Rune Maker and im trying to make a command that allows you to buy items with a command and pay for them with logs. I have tried to set it up but im not that good with commands so heres what I got so far. Every time I compile tho I get major problems with about 16 lines of coding.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("buyclaws") && ItemID == (1514,9000)){ deleteItem(1514, 9000); addItem(8002, 1); setAnimation(894); sM("You trade 9,000 Magic Logs for Dragon Claws!"); }

Anyone who can help me learn the proper way to do this would get a rep ++ for sure :D, I don’t like learning new things about coding but I have to do it so I can bring a better a better game to my players.

Read full topic
item.source: Buying item command help rep ++ for help!
